report.query:
WITH t_entry_name AS (SELECT entry_name, category_code, entry_code FROM common_code_category_entry WHERE active_status ='1' AND category_code IN ('FREQUENCY','MORTGAGE_TYPE','PROPERTY_TYPE','HDFC_SEGMENT','ADV_NAME', 'TYPE_CHARGE') ), t_valuation_1 AS (SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CMS_COLLATERAL_ID ORDER BY id DESC) rnk, cms_collateral_id, VAL_CREATION_DATE_V1, TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V1, VALUATOR_COMPANY_V1, VALUATION_DATE_V1, ( CASE WHEN BUILTUP_AREA_V1=0 THEN '-' ELSE BUILTUP_AREA_V1 ||' ' || (SELECT entry_name FROM common_code_category_entry WHERE entry_code=BUILTUP_AREA_UOM_V1 and active_status='1' ) END )AS BUILTUP_AREA_V1, ( CASE WHEN LAND_AREA_V1=0 THEN '-' ELSE LAND_AREA_V1 ||' ' || (SELECT entry_name FROM common_code_category_entry WHERE entry_code=LAND_AREA_UOM_V1 and active_status='1' ) END )AS LAND_AREA_V1, LAND_VALUE_IRB_V1, BUILDING_VALUE_IRB_V1, RECONSTRUCTION_VALUE_IRB_V1 FROM CMS_PROPERTY_VAL1 ) WHERE rnk < = 3 ), t_valuation_2 AS (SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CMS_COLLATERAL_ID ORDER BY id DESC) rnk, cms_collateral_id, VAL_CREATION_DATE_V2, TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V2, VALUATOR_COMPANY_V2, VALUATION_DATE_V2, ( CASE WHEN BUILTUP_AREA_V2=0 THEN '-' ELSE BUILTUP_AREA_V2 ||' ' || (SELECT entry_name FROM common_code_category_entry WHERE entry_code=BUILTUP_AREA_UOM_V2 and active_status='1' ) END )AS BUILTUP_AREA_V2, ( CASE WHEN LAND_AREA_V2=0 THEN '-' ELSE LAND_AREA_V2 ||' ' || (SELECT entry_name FROM common_code_category_entry WHERE entry_code=LAND_AREA_UOM_V2 and active_status='1' ) END )AS LAND_AREA_V2, LAND_VALUE_IRB_V2, BUILDING_VALUE_IRB_V2, RECONSTRUCTION_VALUE_IRB_V2 FROM CMS_PROPERTY_VAL2 ) WHERE rnk< =3 ), t_valuation_3 AS (SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY CMS_COLLATERAL_ID ORDER BY id DESC) rnk, cms_collateral_id, VAL_CREATION_DATE_V3, TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V3, VALUATOR_COMPANY_V3, VALUATION_DATE_V3, ( CASE WHEN BUILTUP_AREA_V3=0 THEN '-' ELSE BUILTUP_AREA_V3 ||' ' || (SELECT entry_name FROM common_code_category_entry WHERE entry_code=BUILTUP_AREA_UOM_V3 and active_status='1' ) END )AS BUILTUP_AREA_V3, ( CASE WHEN LAND_AREA_V3=0 THEN '-' ELSE LAND_AREA_V3 ||' ' || (SELECT entry_name FROM common_code_category_entry WHERE entry_code=LAND_AREA_UOM_V3 and active_status='1' ) END )AS LAND_AREA_V3, LAND_VALUE_IRB_V3, BUILDING_VALUE_IRB_V3, RECONSTRUCTION_VALUE_IRB_V3 FROM CMS_PROPERTY_VAL3 ) WHERE rnk< =3 ) SELECT DISTINCT(SEC.CMS_COLLATERAL_ID) AS SecurityID, prop.DESCRIPTION_ASSET AS Borrowers_Name, prop.property_address ||' ' ||prop.property_address_2 ||' ' ||prop.property_address_3 ||' ' ||prop.property_address_4 ||' ' ||prop.property_address_5 ||' ' ||prop.property_address_6 AS propertyaddress, (SELECT r.country_name FROM cms_country r WHERE r.id= prop.country ) AS country, (SELECT state_name FROM cms_state r WHERE r.id= prop.state ) AS state, --new (SELECT city_name FROM cms_city c WHERE c.id= prop.nearest_city ) AS city,--new prop.other_city AS otherCity, prop.pincode AS pincode,--new sp.lsp_le_id AS partyId, sp.lsp_short_name AS partyName, -- sbb.SYSTEM_BANK_BRANCH_NAME AS VaultLocation, ( SELECT entry_name FROM t_entry_name WHERE category_code = 'HDFC_SEGMENT' AND entry_code = sp.lsp_sgmnt_code_value ) AS segment, (SELECT region_name FROM cms_region r WHERE r.id= fnc_lra_region(sp.cms_le_main_profile_id) ) AS cusRegion, --reg.region_name AS cusRegion, ( SELECT region_name FROM cms_region r WHERE r.id= sp.rm_region ) AS rmregion,--new --(SELECT rm.rm_mgr_name FROM cms_relationship_mgr rm WHERE rm.id=sp.relation_mgr ) AS rmregion, rm.rm_mgr_name AS RMName, ( CASE WHEN sec.sec_priority ='Y' THEN 'Primary' WHEN sec.sec_priority ='N' THEN 'Secondary' ELSE '-' END ) AS securityPriority, ( CASE WHEN sec.monitor_process ='Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN sec.monitor_process ='N' THEN 'No' ELSE '-' END ) AS monitorProcCol, (SELECT ENTRY_NAME FROM t_entry_name WHERE category_code='FREQUENCY' -- AND active_status ='1' AND entry_code = sec.monitor_frequency ) AS monitorProcColFreq, sbb.SYSTEM_BANK_BRANCH_NAME AS VaultLocation, sbb.custodian1 AS VaultCustodian1, sbb.custodian2 AS VaultCustodian2, (SELECT ENTRY_NAME FROM t_entry_name WHERE ENTRY_CODE = prop.margage_type --AND active_status ='1' AND CATEGORY_CODE = 'MORTGAGE_TYPE' ) AS MORTGAGE_TYPE, TO_CHAR(prop.SALE_PURCHASE_DATE,'DD/Mon/YYYY') AS DateOfMortgage, COALESCE ( (SELECT BANK_NAME FROM cms_other_bank WHERE deprecated='N' AND status ='ACTIVE' AND id =prop.morgage_created_by ), (SELECT SYSTEM_BANK_NAME FROM cms_system_bank WHERE deprecated='N' AND status ='ACTIVE' AND id =prop.morgage_created_by )) AS mortgageCreatedBy, prop.mortage_registered_ref AS mortgageRegdRef, prop.developer_group_company AS propertyownername, prop.property_id, (SELECT ENTRY_NAME FROM t_entry_name WHERE category_code = 'PROPERTY_TYPE' --AND active_status ='1' AND ENTRY_CODE = prop.property_type ) AS property_type, --new TO_CHAR(prop.valuation_date,'DD/MON/YYYY') AS ValuationDate, --new (SELECT entry_name FROM t_entry_name WHERE entry_code =sec.reval_freq --AND active_status='1' ) AS revalFreq, TO_CHAR(sec.next_valuation_date,'DD/MON/YYYY') AS nextValDate, (SELECT entry_name FROM t_entry_name WHERE category_code = 'ADV_NAME' --AND active_status ='1' AND entry_code = prop.advocate_lawyer_name ) AS advocate_name, --new prop.remarks_property,--new prop.lot_no AS LOTNo, ( CASE WHEN prop.is_phy_inspect ='Y' OR prop.is_phy_inspect = '1' THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END ) AS phyVerifOfCol, -- prop.is_phy_inspect AS phyVerifOfCol, ( SELECT ENTRY_NAME FROM t_entry_name WHERE category_code='FREQUENCY' --AND active_status ='1' AND entry_code = prop.phy_inspect_freq_unit ) AS phyVerifOfColFreq, TO_CHAR(prop.last_phy_inspect_date,'DD/MON/YYYY') AS phyVerifDoneOn, TO_CHAR(prop.next_phy_inspect_date ,'DD/MON/YYYY') AS nxtPhyVerifDueOn, ( CASE WHEN prop.claim ='Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN prop.claim ='N' THEN 'No' ELSE '-' END ) AS priorClaim, ( CASE WHEN prop.claim_type ='LITIGATION' THEN 'Litigation' WHEN prop.claim_type ='PROPERTY_TAX' THEN 'Property Tax' WHEN prop.claim_type ='OTHERS_CLAIM' THEN 'Others' ELSE '-' END ) AS typeOfClaim, (SELECT ENTRY_NAME FROM t_entry_name WHERE category_code='TYPE_CHARGE' -- AND active_status ='1' AND entry_code = sec.change_type ) AS typeOfCharge, ( CASE WHEN sec.other_bank_charge IS NULL THEN '-' WHEN sec.other_bank_charge IS NOT NULL THEN sec.other_bank_charge ||'%' END ) AS pectFstChgByBank, ( CASE WHEN prop.env_risky_status ='Y' THEN 'Yes' WHEN prop.env_risky_status ='N' THEN 'No' WHEN prop.env_risky_status ='NA' THEN 'Not Applicable' ELSE '-' END ) AS secEnvRisky, TO_CHAR(prop.TSR_DATE,'DD/MON/YYYY') TSR_DATE, (SELECT entry_name FROM t_entry_name WHERE category_code='FREQUENCY' AND entry_code =prop.TSR_FREQUENCY ) TSR_freq, TO_CHAR(prop.NEXT_TSR_DATE,'DD/MON/YYYY') NXT_TSR_DATE, DECODE(prop.CERSIA_REG_DATE,NULL,NULL,TO_CHAR(prop.CERSIA_REG_DATE,'DD/MON/YYYY')) CERSIA_DATE, TO_CHAR(curval1.VAL_CREATION_DATE_V1,'DD/MON/YYYY') VAL_CREATION_DATE_V1, curval1.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V1, -- curval1.VALUATOR_COMPANY_V1, (SELECT VALUATION_AGENCY_NAME FROM CMS_VALUATION_AGENCY WHERE id =curval1.VALUATOR_COMPANY_V1 AND STATUS='ACTIVE' ) AS VALUATOR_COMPANY_V1, TO_CHAR(curval1.VALUATION_DATE_V1,'DD/MON/YYYY') VALUATION_DATE_V1, curval1.BUILTUP_AREA_V1, curval1.LAND_AREA_V1, curval1.LAND_VALUE_IRB_V1, curval1.BUILDING_VALUE_IRB_V1, curval1.RECONSTRUCTION_VALUE_IRB_V1, TO_CHAR(curval2.VAL_CREATION_DATE_V2,'DD/MON/YYYY') VAL_CREATION_DATE_V2, curval2.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V2, -- curval2.VALUATOR_COMPANY_V2, ( SELECT VALUATION_AGENCY_NAME FROM CMS_VALUATION_AGENCY WHERE id = curval2.VALUATOR_COMPANY_V2 AND STATUS='ACTIVE' ) AS VALUATOR_COMPANY_V2, TO_CHAR(curval2.VALUATION_DATE_V2,'DD/MON/YYYY') VALUATION_DATE_V2, curval2.BUILTUP_AREA_V2, curval2.LAND_AREA_V2, curval2.LAND_VALUE_IRB_V2, curval2.BUILDING_VALUE_IRB_V2, curval2.RECONSTRUCTION_VALUE_IRB_V2, TO_CHAR(curval3.VAL_CREATION_DATE_V3,'DD/MON/YYYY') VAL_CREATION_DATE_V3, curval3.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V3, -- curval3.VALUATOR_COMPANY_V3, ( SELECT VALUATION_AGENCY_NAME FROM CMS_VALUATION_AGENCY WHERE id = curval3.VALUATOR_COMPANY_V3 AND STATUS='ACTIVE' ) AS VALUATOR_COMPANY_V3, TO_CHAR(curval3.VALUATION_DATE_V3,'DD/MON/YYYY') VALUATION_DATE_V3, curval3.BUILTUP_AREA_V3, curval3.LAND_AREA_V3, curval3.LAND_VALUE_IRB_V3, curval3.BUILDING_VALUE_IRB_V3, curval3.RECONSTRUCTION_VALUE_IRB_V3, sec.CMV, TO_CHAR(preval1.VAL_CREATION_DATE_V1,'DD/MON/YYYY') pre_VAL_CREATION_DATE_V1, preval1.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V1 pre_TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V1, -- preval1.VALUATOR_COMPANY_V1 pre_VALUATOR_COMPANY_V1, ( SELECT VALUATION_AGENCY_NAME FROM CMS_VALUATION_AGENCY WHERE id = preval1.VALUATOR_COMPANY_V1 AND STATUS='ACTIVE' ) AS pre_VALUATOR_COMPANY_V1, TO_CHAR(preval1.VALUATION_DATE_V1,'DD/MON/YYYY') pre_VALUATION_DATE_V1, preval1.BUILTUP_AREA_V1 pre_BUILTUP_AREA_V1, preval1.LAND_AREA_V1 pre_LAND_AREA_V1, preval1.LAND_VALUE_IRB_V1 pre_LAND_VALUE_IRB_V1, preval1.BUILDING_VALUE_IRB_V1 pre_BUILDING_VALUE_IRB_V1, preval1.RECONSTRUCTION_VALUE_IRB_V1 pre_RECONSTRUCTION_VALUE_IRB_V1, TO_CHAR(preval2.VAL_CREATION_DATE_V2,'DD/MON/YYYY') pre_VAL_CREATION_DATE_V2, preval2.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V2 pre_TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V2, -- preval2.VALUATOR_COMPANY_V2 pre_VALUATOR_COMPANY_V2, ( SELECT VALUATION_AGENCY_NAME FROM CMS_VALUATION_AGENCY WHERE id = preval2.VALUATOR_COMPANY_V2 AND STATUS='ACTIVE' ) AS pre_VALUATOR_COMPANY_V2 , TO_CHAR(preval2.VALUATION_DATE_V2,'DD/MON/YYYY') pre_VALUATION_DATE_V2, preval2.BUILTUP_AREA_V2 pre_BUILTUP_AREA_V2, preval2.LAND_AREA_V2 pre_LAND_AREA_V2, preval2.LAND_VALUE_IRB_V2 pre_LAND_VALUE_IRB_V2, preval2.BUILDING_VALUE_IRB_V2 pre_BUILDING_VALUE_IRB_V2, preval2.RECONSTRUCTION_VALUE_IRB_V2 pre_RECONSTRUCTION_VALUE_IRB_V2, TO_CHAR(preval3.VAL_CREATION_DATE_V3,'DD/MON/YYYY') pre_VAL_CREATION_DATE_V3, preval3.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V3 pre_TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V3, -- preval3.VALUATOR_COMPANY_V3 pre_VALUATOR_COMPANY_V3, ( SELECT VALUATION_AGENCY_NAME FROM CMS_VALUATION_AGENCY WHERE id = preval3.VALUATOR_COMPANY_V3 AND STATUS='ACTIVE' ) pre_VALUATOR_COMPANY_V3, TO_CHAR(preval3.VALUATION_DATE_V3,'DD/MON/YYYY') pre_VALUATION_DATE_V3, preval3.BUILTUP_AREA_V3 pre_BUILTUP_AREA_V3, preval3.LAND_AREA_V3 pre_LAND_AREA_V3, preval3.LAND_VALUE_IRB_V3 pre_LAND_VALUE_IRB_V3, preval3.BUILDING_VALUE_IRB_V3 pre_BUILDING_VALUE_IRB_V3, preval3.RECONSTRUCTION_VALUE_IRB_V3 pre_RECONSTRUCTION_VALUE_IRB_V3, -- least(preval1.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V1 , preval2.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V2 , preval3.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V3) pre_CMV, LEAST( COALESCE(preval1.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V1, preval2.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V2, preval3.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V3), COALESCE(preval2.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V2, preval3.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V3, preval1.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V1), COALESCE(preval3.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V3, preval1.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V1, preval2.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V2) ) pre_CMV,
TO_CHAR(pre2preval1.VAL_CREATION_DATE_V1,'DD/MON/YYYY') pre2pre_VAL_CREATION_DATE_V1, pre2preval1.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V1 pre2pre_TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V1, -- pre2preval1.VALUATOR_COMPANY_V1 pre2pre_VALUATOR_COMPANY_V1, ( SELECT VALUATION_AGENCY_NAME FROM CMS_VALUATION_AGENCY WHERE id = pre2preval1.VALUATOR_COMPANY_V1 AND STATUS='ACTIVE' ) AS pre2pre_VALUATOR_COMPANY_V1, TO_CHAR(pre2preval1.VALUATION_DATE_V1,'DD/MON/YYYY') pre2pre_VALUATION_DATE_V1, pre2preval1.BUILTUP_AREA_V1 pre2pre_BUILTUP_AREA_V1, pre2preval1.LAND_AREA_V1 pre2pre_LAND_AREA_V1, pre2preval1.LAND_VALUE_IRB_V1 pre2pre_LAND_VALUE_IRB_V1, pre2preval1.BUILDING_VALUE_IRB_V1 pre2pre_BUILDING_VALUE_IRB_V1, pre2preval1.RECONSTRUCTION_VALUE_IRB_V1 pre2pre_RECONSTRUCTION_VALUE_IRB_V1, TO_CHAR(pre2preval2.VAL_CREATION_DATE_V2,'DD/MON/YYYY') pre2pre_VAL_CREATION_DATE_V2, pre2preval2.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V2 pre2pre_TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V2, -- pre2preval2.VALUATOR_COMPANY_V2 pre2pre_VALUATOR_COMPANY_V2, ( SELECT VALUATION_AGENCY_NAME FROM CMS_VALUATION_AGENCY WHERE id = pre2preval2.VALUATOR_COMPANY_V2 AND STATUS='ACTIVE' ) AS pre2pre_VALUATOR_COMPANY_V2, TO_CHAR(pre2preval2.VALUATION_DATE_V2,'DD/MON/YYYY') pre2pre_VALUATION_DATE_V2, pre2preval2.BUILTUP_AREA_V2 pre2pre_BUILTUP_AREA_V2, pre2preval2.LAND_AREA_V2 pre2pre_LAND_AREA_V2, pre2preval2.LAND_VALUE_IRB_V2 pre2pre_LAND_VALUE_IRB_V2, pre2preval2.BUILDING_VALUE_IRB_V2 pre2pre_BUILDING_VALUE_IRB_V2, pre2preval2.RECONSTRUCTION_VALUE_IRB_V2 pre2pre_RECONSTRUCTION_VALUE_IRB_V2, TO_CHAR(pre2preval3.VAL_CREATION_DATE_V3,'DD/MON/YYYY') pre2pre_VAL_CREATION_DATE_V3, pre2preval3.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V3 pre2pre_TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V3, -- pre2preval3.VALUATOR_COMPANY_V3 pre2pre_VALUATOR_COMPANY_V3, ( SELECT VALUATION_AGENCY_NAME FROM CMS_VALUATION_AGENCY WHERE id = pre2preval3.VALUATOR_COMPANY_V3 AND STATUS='ACTIVE' ) AS pre2pre_VALUATOR_COMPANY_V3 , TO_CHAR(pre2preval3.VALUATION_DATE_V3,'DD/MON/YYYY') pre2pre_VALUATION_DATE_V3, pre2preval3.BUILTUP_AREA_V3 pre2pre_BUILTUP_AREA_V3, pre2preval3.LAND_AREA_V3 pre2pre_LAND_AREA_V3, pre2preval3.LAND_VALUE_IRB_V3 pre2pre_LAND_VALUE_IRB_V3, pre2preval3.BUILDING_VALUE_IRB_V3 pre2pre_BUILDING_VALUE_IRB_V3, pre2preval3.RECONSTRUCTION_VALUE_IRB_V3 pre2pre_RECONSTRUCTION_VALUE_IRB_V3, -- least(pre2preval1.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V1, pre2preval2.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V2, pre2preval3.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V3) pre2pre_CMV, LEAST( COALESCE(pre2preval1.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V1, pre2preval2.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V2, pre2preval3.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V3), COALESCE(pre2preval2.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V2, pre2preval3.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V3, pre2preval1.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V1), COALESCE(pre2preval3.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V3, pre2preval1.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V1, pre2preval2.TOTAL_PROPERTY_AMOUNT_V2) ) pre2pre_CMV,
TO_CHAR(prop.LEGALAUDITDATE,'DD/MON/YYYY') LEGALAUDITDATE, TO_CHAR(prop.INTERVEINGPERISEARCHDATE,'DD/MON/YYYY') INTERVEINGPERISEARCHDATE, prop.SALE_PURCHASE_VALUE FROM SCI_LE_SUB_PROFILE sp INNER JOIN cms_relationship_mgr rm ON rm.id=sp.relation_mgr INNER JOIN SCI_LSP_LMT_PROFILE pf ON sp.cms_le_sub_profile_id = pf.cms_customer_id INNER JOIN SCI_LSP_APPR_LMTS lmts ON pf.cms_lsp_lmt_profile_id = lmts.CMS_LIMIT_PROFILE_ID INNER JOIN CMS_LIMIT_SECURITY_MAP lsm ON lmts.cms_lsp_appr_lmts_id = lsm.cms_lsp_appr_lmts_id INNER JOIN CMS_SECURITY sec ON SEC.CMS_COLLATERAL_ID = LSM.CMS_COLLATERAL_ID INNER JOIN CMS_PROPERTY prop ON sec.cms_collateral_id = prop.cms_collateral_id LEFT JOIN t_valuation_1 curval1 ON prop.cms_collateral_id=curval1.cms_collateral_id AND curval1.rnk =1 LEFT JOIN t_valuation_1 preval1 ON prop.cms_collateral_id=preval1.cms_collateral_id AND preval1.rnk =2 LEFT JOIN t_valuation_1 pre2preval1 ON prop.cms_collateral_id=pre2preval1.cms_collateral_id AND pre2preval1.rnk =3 LEFT JOIN t_valuation_2 curval2 ON prop.cms_collateral_id=curval2.cms_collateral_id AND curval2.rnk =1 LEFT JOIN t_valuation_2 preval2 ON prop.cms_collateral_id=preval2.cms_collateral_id AND preval2.rnk =2 LEFT JOIN t_valuation_2 pre2preval2 ON prop.cms_collateral_id=pre2preval2.cms_collateral_id AND pre2preval2.rnk =3 LEFT JOIN t_valuation_3 curval3 ON prop.cms_collateral_id=curval3.cms_collateral_id AND curval3.rnk =1 LEFT JOIN t_valuation_3 preval3 ON prop.cms_collateral_id=preval3.cms_collateral_id AND preval3.rnk =2 LEFT JOIN t_valuation_3 pre2preval3 ON prop.cms_collateral_id=pre2preval3.cms_collateral_id AND pre2preval3.rnk =3 LEFT JOIN CMS_SYSTEM_BANK_BRANCH sbb ON sec.SECURITY_ORGANISATION = sbb.SYSTEM_BANK_BRANCH_CODE

whereClause.mandatoryClause: sec.security_sub_type_id = 'PT701' AND sp.status != 'INACTIVE' AND lmts.cms_limit_status != 'DELETED' AND nvl(lsm.update_status_ind,'D') != 'D'

reportColumn.header: % Of First Charge By Other Bank
Previous to previous Valuation 1- Total Property Amount
Previous to previous Valuation 1- Land Area
Previous to previous Valuation 1- Land Value
Previous to previous Valuation 2 - Total Property Amount
Previous to previous Valuation 2 - Land Area
Previous to previous Valuation 2 - Land Value
Previous to previous Valuation 3 - Total Property Amount
Previous to previous Valuation 3 - Land Area
Previous to previous Valuation 3 - Land Value
